name: RPOL.net Aqua-Green Celtic Style
description: An aqua and green style with simple white celtic knotwork for RPOL.net.
additional_info:
This theme has been updated to work with the latest version of RPOL (RuBB v.1.9.54)


Note: This theme contains images created using brushes that are under license from obsidiandawn.com. I've chosen a non-commercial creative commons license with attribution. If attributing, please also make reference to obsidiandawn.com
Thank you.
